text: In America is a 2002 Irish British American drama movie directed by Jim Sheridan and starring Paddy Considine, Samantha Morton, Sarah Bolger, Djimon Hounsou. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was nominated for 3 Academy Awards in 2004. ==Other websites== * * Category:2002 drama movies Category:Irish drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Jim Sheridan
title: In America (movie)
